column4: Since I can't see the computer (Dell Latitude D810) before I buy it and I am going to be running Ubuntu on it -- I am wondering how the UXGA display looks when the resolution is reduced.  Fuzzy or not?  I don't care to much how it looks under Windows.  I'm wondering if the resolution will be to small for me to read, although I've heard the display looks great.
BluDevil: why not?  I'm down to either ThinkPad or Dell but Dell is easier to buy.
because they ship crap and make it expensive
then what do you recommend that will run Ubuntu/Linux and has a good at-home service plan?
no hardware vendor does at-home service for linux
they said they would send someone to my house with parts if it breaks.
something that was meant for voidfx :)
